name: Sweet Chili Chicken Bites
preparation: In a 4-Cup Prep Bowl, combine mix with water and rice vinegar. Microwave on high, uncovered, 2 min, stirring halfway. Let cool before use.
Cube chicken; place in a bowl. Toss with corn starch.
In a sauté pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken. Cook until golden, turning pieces, 5–7 min or until cooked through.
Toss or serve with prepared sauce.
tips: For best results, let sauce cool before use. If used hot out of the microwave, the chicken will lose its crispiness.
No rice vinegar? No problem—swap for white vinegar in a pinch!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup rice and 1 cup steamed veggies, your choice.
